archimate:Goal.name: Appropriate activities to identify the occurrence of a security event are implemented
archimate:Goal.documentation:
The tooling infrastructure support the required capabilities for the service
Tooling infrastructure enable the ability to limit or contain the impact of a potential security event
Protect supports the ability to limit or contain the impact of a potential security event
Detect defines the activities to identify the occurrence of a security event
Respond defines activities to take action regarding a detected security incident
infrastructure to correlate, protect, detect and respond on threats implemented
